readability_reflection: For me concatenation was more readable but interpolation looks neater. I think concatenation was more readable only because its what I'm used to. I never really used interpolation when I was taught.
comprehension_debugging: Interpolation made me a little more confused on where spaces were supposed to be in the whole string.
preference_rationale: I would prefer interpolation since it looks cleaner to me and more interesting than concatenation.
learning_curve: I know concatenation more than interpolation so I felt easier to answer the concatenation questions.
